text: allahuvinre khajanavukal enre pakkaluntenn nan ninnaleat parayunnumilla. nan adrsyakaryam ariyukayumilla. ninnalute kannukal nis'saramayi kanunnavareparri, avarkk allahu yatearu gunavum nalkunnateyalla ennum nan parayukayilla. allahuvan avarute manas'sukalilullatinepparri nallavannam ariyunnavan. appeal (avare dusicc parayunna paksam) tirccayayum nan akramikalil pettavanayirikkum
